committees.committee: House Banking, Finance, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A bill to amend section 242 of the National Housing Act to eliminate the present exclusion from the hospital mortgage insurance program of hospitals which primarily serve patients with drug and alcoholic conditions of mental disorders.

summary.text: Amends the National Housing Act to eliminate the present exclusion from hospital mortgage insurance programs of hospitals which primarily serve patients with drug and alcoholic conditions or mental disorders.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 242 of the National Housing Act to eliminate the present exclusion from the hospital mortgage insurance program of hospitals which primarily serve patients with drug and alcoholic conditions of mental disorders.
